EmailTemplate.subject: New Case(s) Added to PMT Real Estate Queue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello PMT Real Estate,
There have been new Case(s) added to the PMT Real Estate Queue. Click the link below to go directly to the Queue.

Salesforce Support Team
